// Generated using webpack-cli https://github.com/webpack/webpack-cli
2 
3const path = require("path");
4const HtmlWebpackPlugin = require("html-webpack-plugin");
5const MiniCssExtractPlugin = require("mini-css-extract-plugin");
6 
7const isProduction = process.env.NODE_ENV == "production";
8const stylesHandler = MiniCssExtractPlugin.loader;
9const config = {
10  entry: "./src/index.js",
11  output: {
12    path: path.resolve(__dirname, "dist"),
13  },
14  devServer: {
15    open: true,
16    host: "localhost",
17    hot: true,
18  },
19  plugins: [
20    new HtmlWebpackPlugin({
21      template: "index.html",
22    }),
23 
24    // Add your plugins here
25    // Learn more about plugins from https://webpack.js.org/configuration/plugins/
26  ],
27  module: {
28    rules: [
29      {
30        test: /\.(js|jsx)$/i,
31        loader: "babel-loader",
32      },
33      {
34        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/i,
35        use: [stylesHandler, "css-loader", "postcss-loader", "sass-loader"],
36      },
37      {
38        test: /\.(eot|svg|ttf|woff|woff2|png|jpg|gif)$/i,
39        type: "asset",
40      },
41 
42      // Add your rules for custom modules here
43      // Learn more about loaders from https://webpack.js.org/loaders/
44    ],
45  },
46};
47 
48module.exports = () => {
49  if (isProduction) {
50    config.mode = "production";
51 
52    config.plugins.push(
53      new MiniCssExtractPlugin({
54        filename: "css/[name].[hash].css",
55      })
56    );
57  } else {
58    config.mode = "development";
59  }
60  return config;
61};
